20110108021528.000|20110108021531.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20110108021531.000|20110108021531.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20110108021531.000|20110108021534.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110108021534.000|20110108021536.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110108021536.000|20110108021536.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110108021536.000|20110108021538.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110108021538.000|20110108021538.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110108021538.000|20110108021541.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20110108021541.000|20110108021542.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20110108021542.000|20110108021542.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20110108021542.000|20110108021545.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20110108021545.000|20110108021547.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20110108021547.000|20110108021547.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20110108021547.000|20110108021549.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20110108021549.000|20110108021549.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20110108021549.000|20110108021551.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20110108021551.000|20110108021551.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20110108021551.000|20110108021553.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20110108021553.000|20110108021553.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20110108021553.000|20110108021555.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20110108021555.000|20110108021557.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20110108021557.000|20110108021557.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20110108021557.000|20110108021559.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20110108021559.000|20110108021559.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20110108021559.000|20110108021601.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20110108021601.000|20110108021601.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta   
20110108021601.000|20110108021604.000|CC1|        is right for you.       
20110108021604.000|20110108021604.000|CC1|         Get Lunesta for        
20110108021604.000|20110108021608.000|CC1|   a $0 CO-PAY at Lunesta.com.
